properties.name: base-oauth-url
properties.description: The Keycloak realm that issues tokens accepted by this resource server.

properties.name: organization-api-client-id
properties.description: The Keycloak client ID of this bearer-only client.

properties.name: ORGANIZATIONS_API_TOKEN_URL
properties.description: FOR TESTS ONLY. The URL of the token issuer.

properties.name: ORGANIZATIONS_API_TOKEN_CREDENTIALS
properties.description: FOR TESTS ONLY. Credentials for the integration test client.
